CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College Archives relative to Meridian Academy Collection?
SRP.A: Celestial College Archives is {below} Meridian Academy Collection in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Celestial College Archives relative to Zenith Tech Library?
SRP.A: Celestial College Archives is {above} Zenith Tech Library in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Zenith Tech Library relative to Meridian Academy Collection?
SRP.A: Zenith Tech Library is {below} Meridian Academy Collection in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Meridian Academy Collection}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total library visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Arcane University Library}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Meridian Academy Collection's minimum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Meridian Academy Collection's minimum Library Visits is in {1960}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Celestial College Archives's maximum Library Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Celestial College Archives's maximum Library Visits is in {1988}.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1982, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1966 and 1971?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1981 and 1982 was {smaller} than between 1966 and 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1966, was the average total Library Visits higher or lower than between 1975 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total library visits between 1964 and 1966 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1972 and 1981, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1972 and 1986?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1972 and 1981 was {smaller} than between 1972 and 1986.

NC.Q: Between 1964 and 1988, did the total Library Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1976 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total library visits between 1964 and 1988 was {larger} than between 1976 and 1985.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Meridian Academy Collection} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Arcane University Library and Meridian Academy Collection first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Arcane University Library and Meridian Academy Collection first exchanged leading positions in {1961}.
